conversion_verification.notes: Successful isometric cutaway conversion with consistent perspective.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D depth and wall thickness representation. Isometric angle is clear and consistent.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity to the original room layout and proportions. All major partitions correctly placed.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture matches the 2D layout well; scale and orientation are logically maintained.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering, but floor-level text/labels from the original were partially hallucinated into the 3D texture.

detected_errors.description: Text labels from 2D plan appearing as artifacts on the 3D floor surface.

summary: A highly accurate 3D transformation that preserves the complex geometric footprint of the original floor plan.
